ValidationRule.description: Need to indicate at least 1 quote (1 market approached) in the quotes section
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
$Setup.Master_Validation__c.Account_Active__c && NOT(OR($RecordType.Name = "Health & Benefits", $RecordType.Name = "Scale", $RecordType.Name = "FS Direct")) &&
AND(
Number_of_Quotes__c == 0,
OR(
ISPICKVAL( StageName , "Application Submitted"), ISPICKVAL( StageName , "Additional Info Needed"), ISPICKVAL( StageName , "Proposal Received"), ISPICKVAL( StageName , "Proposal Presented")))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Quote Required: add at least 1 quote & indicate the market approached
